title: difficulty installing go in an fhs environment
body:
by **w.d.hubbs**: 
I understand the need for installing go in one directory (e.g. everything under $GOROOT)
for development purposes, but as a packager, I am interested in installing it in an FHS
compatible way, e.g. binaries in /usr/bin, packages in /usr/lib/go/pkg, documentation in
/usr/share/doc/go, etc.  Is this possible?  If so, how should I set GOROOT in this
environment?
